A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It a watchable film but clearly all the reviews have been paid to say good things. The effects are really good\, action sequences are well crafted\, and general the artists have done an amazing job\, whilst also giving this the feel of the original Star Wars

But the writing and direction is terrible.

List of annoying things (spoilers but who cares)

Cheesy dumb villain phone not working joke at beginning.
Leia flying through space like Marry Poppings.
killing off beloved admiral Ackbar and replacing him with purple hair lady for no reason.
Purple hair lady refused to tell anyone the plan\, they're about to died\, why is it a secret?
Plot being that big ships are too slow to catch the smaller ships
Luke milking from space walrus.
Luke drinking space walrus milk and looking at the camera like a sex pervert.
Luke being bested by girl with no training.
Luke being a miserable cry baby.
Yoda showing up as ghost and telling Luke all the Jedi knowledge is pointless\, then burns the building with lightning.
Jedi knowledge books existence and the fact they're stored in an old hut guarded by space nuns.
Furry penguins turning chewy into a vegetarian.
Overly long casino scene\, with f**k capitalism undertones.
Picking up random guy from casino prison who just happens to be a "coder".
Mary Sue (google it) Jedi girl
Sith villain killed off in a dumb way
Rey and Kylo fight kylie Minogue music video extras
